channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Secure Connect Gateway (SCG) 5.0 Appliance - SRS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Secure Connect Gateway (SCG) 5.0 Appliance - SRS

item.title: CVE-2023-23695|2024-08-02T10:35:33.665Z -- dell -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%205.0%20appliance%20-%20srs
item.description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway (SCG) version 5.14.00.12 contains a broken cryptographic algorithm vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability by performing MitM attacks and let attackers obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-22458|2024-06-04T17:52:46.093Z -- dell -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%205.0%20appliance%20-%20srs
item.description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway, 5.18, contains an Inadequate Encryption Strength Vulnerability. An unauthenticated network attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, allowing an attacker to recover plaintext from a block of ciphertext.

item.title: CVE-2024-22457|2024-03-01T11:04:14.286Z -- dell -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%205.0%20appliance%20-%20srs
item.description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway 5.20 contains an improper authentication vulnerability during the SRS to SCG update path. A remote low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to impersonation of the server through presenting a fake self-signed certificate and communicating with the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-22457|2024-08-01T22:43:34.962Z -- dell -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%205.0%20appliance%20-%20srs
item.description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway 5.20 contains an improper authentication vulnerability during the SRS to SCG update path. A remote low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to impersonation of the server through presenting a fake self-signed certificate and communicating with the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-22458|2024-08-01T22:43:34.919Z -- dell -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%205.0%20appliance%20-%20srs
item.description: Dell Secure Connect Gateway, 5.18, contains an Inadequate Encryption Strength Vulnerability. An unauthenticated network attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, allowing an attacker to recover plaintext from a block of ciphertext.
